function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of social legitimacy and acceptance of adaptive strategies","category":"Visitors","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of adherence to new regulations wearing masks in public leading to increased spread of the disease.","category":"Participation","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Severe loss of demand and revenues in non-essential services such as entertainment and tourism.","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to financial aid and resources for smes, especially in skill development and training.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective economic interventions","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective public health policies","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of agility and adaptability in coping with crisis times may lead to increased vulnerability to contagious disease outbreaks.","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Strategic sensitivity is a critical capability for service smes, particularly in anticipation and understanding of pandemic and post-pandemic conditions.","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Forced closures of service businesses","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of contagion due to social isolation and increased indoor activities like cooking and baking together with children.","category":"Family","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient diagnostic procedures and increased pressure on health-care services.","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Psychological burden due to negative experiences during the pandemic","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty and worry among actors in the service ecosystem","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Encouraging physical activities for children using basic household items may increase the risk of spreading contagious diseases if proper hygiene and sanitation measures are not followed","category":"Family","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Idle employees in the real estate business during the pandemic may lead to increased risk of viral transmission if proper safety measures are not followed","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased consumption of unhealthy food due to lifestyle changes during the pandemic.","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of access to safe and healthy food options.","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Continuing indoor activities without appropriate safety measures may lead to a higher risk of contagion.","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to financial support during covid-19","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on personal networks for financial support","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of remote patient inspection and consulting capability","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Closure of fitness centers","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of strategic sensitivity in service smes","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate capacity for remote service delivery","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unstructured interviews may lead to inconsistent data collection and analysis.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Purposive sampling may introduce selection bias into the study.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Service smes may struggle to adapt to a changing service ecosystem due to lack of dynamic capabilities.","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Service smes may face challenges in maintaining strategic agility and adapting to post-covid conditions, leading to a decline in performance and market relevance.","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Smes in the service sector may struggle to maintain close customer relationships and sustained organizational learning and innovation during covid-19 and beyond.","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of resourcefulness in smes","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of strategic sensitivity in service smes leading to weak capability in sensing changes in markets","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependency on a small leadership team in service smes for strategic decisions","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decay of meta-capabilities due to focus on day-to-day operations","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for disruptions in market-testing and thought experiments","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of trust and safety among top management affecting leadership unity","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of strategic sensitivity and awareness of emergent trends in the environment","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of leadership unity and commitment to difficult decisions in times of turbulence","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to rapidly implement resource allocation and competency adjustments in response to opportunities","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conducting in-depth interviews with managers of service smes during the pandemic","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Developing new services and transforming existing ones during covid-19","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Utilizing co-creation and dynamic capabilities to foster agility in service smes","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Smes being severely affected by the pandemic","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of agility in decision-making processes","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relying on examples from large companies for agility implications in strategic decision-making","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of economic collapse for smes due to prolonged closures and reduced consumer activity.","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in adapting to remote work practices and maintaining productivity.","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cutting down on marketing and innovation budgets during a crisis","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of social interaction in the built environment can contribute to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Virtual worlds and online shops with avatars could increase the risk of contagious diseases propagation due to the close interaction of people in virtual spaces.","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased social interaction during livestream commerce may lead to higher risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"}]}
